Description:
Detects process access requests from hacktool processes based on their default image name

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Generic Process Access
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\Akagi.exe' or process_path like '%\Akagi64.exe' or process_path like '%\atexec_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\Certify.exe' or process_path like '%\Certipy.exe' or process_path like '%\CoercedPotato.exe' or process_path like '%\crackmapexec.exe' or process_path like '%\CreateMiniDump.exe' or process_path like '%\dcomexec_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\dpapi_windows.exe' or process_path like '% indDelegation_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\GetADUsers_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\GetNPUsers_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getPac_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getST_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getTGT_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\GetUserSPNs_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\gmer.exe' or process_path like '%\hashcat.exe' or process_path like '%\htran.exe' or process_path like '%\ifmap_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\impersonate.exe' or process_path like '%\Inveigh.exe' or process_path like '%\LocalPotato.exe' or process_path like '%\mimikatz_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\mimikatz.exe' or process_path like '%
etview_windows.exe' or process_path like '%
